mapper.select: SELECT STAGE_ID, CREATE_TIMESTAMP, USER_ID, STAGE_TITLE, STAGE_IMAGE, STAGE_LOCATION, STAGE_TIMESTAMP, STAGE_ARTIST_ID, STAGE_DESCRIPTION, STAGE_THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, STAGE_TICKET_PRICE, STAGE_CURRENT, STAGE_STREAM_KEY FROM TB_FULLDIVE_STAGE WHERE 1=1 AND STAGE_CURRENT = 'S' ORDER BY STAGE_TIMESTAMP DESC

SELECT STAGE_ID, TO_CHAR(CREATE_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS'), USER_ID, STAGE_TITLE, STAGE_IMAGE, STAGE_LOCATION, TO_CHAR(STAGE_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS'), STAGE_ARTIST_ID, STAGE_DESCRIPTION, STAGE_THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, STAGE_TICKET_PRICE, STAGE_CURRENT, STAGE_STREAM_KEY FROM TB_FULLDIVE_STAGE WHERE 1=1
AND STAGE_ID = #{stageId}

SELECT STAGE_ID, STAGE_MAKE_USER_ID, STAGE_TITLE, STAGE_IMAGE, STAGE_LOCATION, TO_CHAR(STAGE_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS'), STAGE_ARTIST_ID, STAGE_DESCRIPTION, STAGE_THUMBNAIL_IMGAE, STAGE_TICKET_PRICE, STAGE_CURRENT, DATEDIFF(HOUR, getDate(), STAGE_TIMESTAMP) AS "STAGE_TIME_DIFFERENCE", CREATE_TIMESTAMP FROM TB_FULLDIVE_STAGE WHERE 1=1 AND STAGE_TIMESTAMP < getDate() + 1 AND STAGE_TIMESTAMP > getDate()
